item.title: Gnarls Barkley - Crazy - Ukeledu Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Crazy by Gnarls Barkley from the channel Ukeledu Music. Chords used in the song: Am, Cmaj7, E7, F.

item.title: War - Why Can't We Be Friends? - Key of F - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Why Can't We Be Friends? by War from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: Am, B♭, C, C7, E7, Em, F, G, G7, Gm.

item.title: Mark Ronson feat. Bruno Mars - Uptown Funk - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Uptown Funk by Mark Ronson feat. Bruno Mars from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: Dm, G7.
